titleStmt.title: The personall reigne of Christ upon earth in a treatise wherein is fully and largely laid open and proved that Jesus Christ, together with the saints, shall visibly possesse a monarchicall state and kingdome in this world ... / by John Archer.
titleStmt.author: Archer, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Benjamin Allen,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
